entities: National Movement for Reform and Development
summary:
The Security Council,
Recalling previous resolutions on Sudan, particularly 1665 (2006), 1651 (2005), 1591 (2005), and 1556 (2004),
Stressing its commitment to peace in Sudan, including the Abuja Talks and implementation of the Comprehensive Peace Agreement,
Determining the situation in Sudan remains a threat to international peace and security,
Acting under Chapter VII of the UN Charter,
1. Decides all States shall implement measures specified in paragraph 3 of resolution 1591 (2005) with respect to:
- Major General Gaffar Mohamed Elhassan
- Sheikh Musa Hilal
- Adam Yacub Shant
- Gabril Abdul Kareem Badri
2. Decides to remain actively seized of the matter.
